views.markdown:
**Feature-rich Twitter Enhancer**

- Download videos (even from private accounts)
- Custom tab bar for personalized navigation
- No history mode for added privacy
- Option to hide tweet topics
- Disable video layer captions
- Padlock for extra security
- Font customization feature
- New DM search UI toggle
- Automatically load photos in highest quality
- Undo tweet functionality
- Themes support (like Twitter Blue)
- App icon customization
- Twitter Circle feature support
- Copy profile information with ease
- Save tweets as images
- Hide the Spaces bar
- Disable RTL layout
- Always open links in Safari
- Translate user bios
- Disable edge-to-edge new tweet style
- Enable voice tweets and voice messages in DMs
- Hide promoted tweets from the timeline
- Confirmation alert before tweeting
- Confirmation alert before liking
- Confirmation alert before following
- Built-in FLEX debugging tool

*Long press on the tab bar to access settings*

This project is open-source and available on [GitHub](https://github.com/BandarHL/BHTwitter).

**Latest Update**

**Voice Tweet Settings:**
- Upload custom voice for voice tweets

**Tweet Copy Options:**
- Select preferred URL host (fxtwitter, vxtwitter, etc.) when copying tweets

**General Improvements:**
- Removed unnecessary options from settings.
